text: Thomas Bach, (born 29 December 1953) is a German lawyer and former Olympic fencer. Bach is the ninth and current President of the International Olympic Committee. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:German fencers Category:Lawyers from Bavaria Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Germany Category:Olympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Olympic silver medalists for Germany Category:People from WÃ¼rzburg Category:Presidents of the International Olympic Committee Category:Sportspeople from Bavaria
title: Thomas Bach
